Question
========

20% of adults in the Netherlands fail their driving test. If you randomly select 60 Dutch adults, describe the shape, the center and distribution of this sample distribution of the number of passers:

Answerlist
----------

* It is a normal distribution with mean 12 and standard deviation 1.
* It is a normal distribution with mean 12 and standard deviation 3.1.
* It is a normal distribution with mean 30 and standard deviation 2.
* It is a normal distribution with mean 30 and standard deviation 20.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* It is a normal distribution with mean 12 and standard deviation 1.: Correct
* It is a normal distribution with mean 12 and standard deviation 3.1: Incorrect
* It is a normal distribution with mean 30 and standard deviation 2.: Incorrect
* It is a normal distribution with mean 30 and standard deviation 20: Incorrect
